overview: Dedric Reid is a Global Creative Director with over 16 years of experience. He leads groundbreaking design initiatives across Automotive, Consumer Electronics, Enterprise, Entertainment, and Telecom industries. In his most recent role at Symphony Teleca, his job was to make design a competitive advantage for the company globally—through strong visual design, and transcendent design practices. In this position, Reid helped establish the Connected Experience Design Group. He lead creative teams, designing software products for Google, Motorola, Microsoft, Ford, Cisco, Intel and others. Prior to Symphony, Dedric was Founder of Good Theory, a multidisciplinary design consultancy based in New York City. His company partnered with Johnson & Johnson’s Strategic Design Group and helped engineer next generation medical devices. Dedric has lead design for top innovation firms Frog Design and IDEO. He has also held leadership positions at Global Ad agencies Publicis and R/GA. Dedric has built design teams in China, United Kingdom, Korea, India, Australia, Russia, and Sweden. Today, products designed by Dedric are being used by millions of people around the world.
